article_title: Sheriff Says Clerical Error Enabled Charleston Suspect to Buy Gun
article_text:
A county employee made a clerical error when Dylann Roof was arrested on drug charges in February. The revelation sheds further light on a series of paperwork mix-ups that federal investigators said allowed Mr. Roof to buy the gun he allegedly used in a mass shooting in Charleston, a South Carolina sheriff said Monday.

Mr. Roof, 21 years old, had been arrested twice at the same shopping mall, but booked by different local law...
